column2: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāyātmakam pratyakṣam
atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavat śeṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ ca
pṛthivī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśam iti bhūtāni
samānānekadharmopapatteḥ vipratipatteḥ upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaḥ ca viśeṣāpekṣaḥ vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ
yam artham adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam
laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasmin arthe buddhisāmyam saḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ
avijñātatatve arthe kāraṇopapattitaḥ tattvajñānārtham uhaḥ tarkaḥ
tat trividham - vākchalam sāmānyacchalam upacāracchalam ca iti
aviśeṣābhihite arthe vaktuḥ abhiprāyāt arthāntarakalpanā vākchalam
yathoktādhyavasāyāt eva tadviśeṣāpekṣāt saṃśaye na asaṃśayaḥ na atyantasaṃśayaḥ vā
pūrvaṃ hi pramāṇasiddhau na indriyārthasannikarṣāt pratyakṣotpattiḥ
kvacit nivṛttidarśanāt anivṛttidarśanāt ca kvacit anekāntaḥ
pratyakṣanimittatvāt ca indriyārthayoḥ sannikarṣasya svaśabdena vacanam
na, pratyakṣeṇa yāvat tāvat api upalambhāt
senāvanavat grahaṇam iti cet na atīndriyatvāt aṇūnām
na apratyakṣe gavaye pramāṇārtham upamānasya paśyāmaḥ
tathā iti upasaṃhārāt upamānasiddheḥ na aviśeṣaḥ
stutiḥ nindā parakṛtiḥ purākalpaḥ iti arthavādaḥ
śabde aitihyānarthāntarabhāvāt anumāne arthāpattisambhavābhāvānarthāntara bhāvāt ca apratiṣedhaḥ
asati arthe na abhāvaḥ iti cet na, anyalakṣaṇopapatteḥ
na, ghaṭābhāvasāmānyanityatvāt nityeṣu api anityavat upacārāt ca
anyat anyasmāt ananyatvāt ananyat iti anyatābhāvaḥ
tadabhāve na asti ananyatā, tayoḥ itaretarāpekṣasiddheḥ
dvividhasya api hetoḥ abhāvāt asādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
nityānām atīndriyatvāt taddharmavikalpāt ca varṇavikārāṇām apratiṣedhaḥ
vikāradharmitve nityatvābhāvāt kālāntare vikāropapatteḥ ca apratiṣedhaḥ
vyaktyākṛtiyukte api aprasaṅgāt prokṣaṇādināṃ mṛdgavake jātiḥ
kṛṣṇasāre sati upalambhāt vyatiricya ca upalambhāt saṃśayaḥ
ap-tejo-vāyūnāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvam apohya ākāśasya uttaraḥ
sphaṭike api aparāparotpatteḥ kṣaṇikatvāt vyaktīnām ahetuḥ
kvacit vināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ kvacit ca upalabdheḥ anekāntaḥ
jñānasamavetātmapradeśasannikarṣāt manasaḥ smṛtyutpatteḥ na yugapat utpattiḥ
yathoktahetutvāt pāratantryāt akṛtābhyāgamāt ca na manasaḥ
tat adṛṣṭakāritam iti cet punaḥ tatprasaṅgaḥ apavarge
buddhyā vivecanāttu bhāvānāṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhistantvapakarṣaṇe paṭasadbhāvānupalabdhivat tadanupalabdhiḥ
prāpya sādhyamaprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvādaprāptyāsādhāka tvācca prāptyaprāptisamau
sādharmyātsaṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyādubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyanta saṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyūpagamācca sāmānyasyāpratiṣedhaḥ
dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya tasysa cobhayathā bhāvānnāviśeṣaḥ
pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣamabhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā
svapakṣalakṣanāpekṣopapattyupasaṃhāre hetunirdeśe parapakṣadoṣā bhyupagamāt samāno doṣa iti

pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaraṃ pratijñāvirodhaḥ pratijñāsannyāso hetvantaram arthāntaraṃ nirarthakam avijñātārtham apārthakam aprāpta kālaṃ nyūnam adhikaṃ punaruktam ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogo 'pasiddhānto hetvā bhāsāśca nigrahasthānāni
vijñātasya pariṣadā triḥ abhihitasya api apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam
